test-case.name: K-SeqEmptyFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(1, 2)`.

test-case.name: K-SeqEmptyFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty()`.

test-case.name: K-SeqEmptyFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(empty("string"))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqEmptyFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(empty((1, (), "string")))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqEmptyFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(empty((1, "string")))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqEmptyFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(empty( ((), 1, "string") ))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqEmptyFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(())`.

test-case.name: K-SeqEmptyFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty( ((), (), ()) )`.

test-case.name: K-SeqEmptyFunc-9
test-case.description: fn:empty combined with fn:remove and fn:not.

test-case.name: cbcl-empty-func-001
test-case.description: test fn:empty on a mix of values and expressions
test-case.test: declare function local:generate($arg as xs:integer?) { if ($arg = 0) then (1, 2, 3) else $arg }; fn:empty( ((), local:generate( () ), local:generate( 0 ), (1 to 10000000), local:generate( () ), local:generate(1)) )

test-case.name: cbcl-empty-func-002
test-case.description: Test empty with foreach

test-case.name: cbcl-empty-func-003
test-case.description: Test empty with foreach

test-case.name: cbcl-empty-func-004
test-case.description: Tests empty on text node

test-case.name: cbcl-empty-func-005
test-case.description: Tests on optimization as aggregate function
test-case.test: empty(for $x in (1 to 10)[. mod 2 = 0] return true())

test-case.name: cbcl-empty-func-006
test-case.description: Tests empty on a map expression
test-case.test: empty(for $x in (1 to 10)[. mod 2 = 0] return floor($x))
